00037 #include <stdio.h>
00038 #include <string.h>
00039 #include <avs_aes.h>
00040 
00041 int main(){   
00042     avs_aes_handle context;
00043     int i=0;  
00044   
00045     unsigned int result[4];
00046     unsigned int Userkey[8] = {
00047         0x11111111,0x22222222,0x33333333,0x44444444,
00048         0x55555555,0x66666666,0x77777777,0x88888888};  
00049     unsigned int Payload[4] = {
00050         0xAA555555,0xBB666666,0xCC777777,0xDD888888};  
00051 
00052 
00053 // START AES-Operations
00054     printf("AES-Test\n");
00055     avs_aes_init(&context);
00056     avs_aes_setKey(&context,&Userkey);
00057     avs_aes_setPayload(&context,&Payload);
00058     avs_aes_encrypt(&context);
00059 
00060     while(avs_aes_isBusy(&context)){
00061         printf("not ready\n"); 
00062     } 
00063     printf("receiving 729cd44f 32a48d85 b8188185 c579ae49\n");  
00064     memcpy(result,context.result,4*sizeof(unsigned int));
00065     for(i=0; i<4 ; i++){    
00066         printf("received 0x%X \n",result[i]);   
00067     }
00068     
00069 // Decrypt same payload -  
00070     avs_aes_decrypt(&context);  
00071     while(avs_aes_isBusy(&context)){
00072         printf("not ready\n"); 
00073     }  
00074     printf("receiving 9c7076af ac2e5716 6681d3ac 014f64c0 \n");  
00075     memcpy(result,context.result,4*sizeof(unsigned int));
00076     for(i=0; i<4 ; i++){    
00077         printf("received 0x%X \n",result[i]);   
00078     } 
00079 // Change payload ...
00080     Payload[3] = 0x11111111;
00081     Payload[2] = 0xAAAAAAAA;       
00082     Payload[1] = 0xCCCCCCCC;    
00083     Payload[0] = 0x00000000;
00084     //new encryption
00085     avs_aes_setPayload(&context,&Payload);  
00086     avs_aes_encrypt(&context);
00087     while(avs_aes_isBusy(&context)){
00088         printf("not ready\n"); 
00089     }  
00090     memcpy(result,context.result,4*sizeof(unsigned int));
00091     for(i=0; i<4 ; i++){    
00092         printf("received 0x%X \n",result[i]);   
00093     } 
00094     //new decryption
00095     avs_aes_decrypt(&context);  
00096     while(avs_aes_isBusy(&context)){
00097         printf("not ready\n"); 
00098     }  
00099     memcpy(result,context.result,4*sizeof(unsigned int));
00100     for(i=0; i<4 ; i++){    
00101         printf("received 0x%X \n",result[i]);   
00102     } 
00103     printf("Done \n");  
00104     
00105     
00106     return 0;
00107 
00108 }
